column5: Has anyone fished Pakashkan Lake or any others off of the Graham Road (past Upsala) recently? Spending a week at Pakashkan Lake Lodge July 3-9 and wonder how the fishing has been.
The fishing has been excellant. Buddy is there every weekend at the lodge and fishing has been great. The lake is an awesome producer.
Thanks for the reply. Are you friends with the owner's son? Nice guys up there. My dad and I had a blast up there last year now we are going back with 11 guys this year.
How was the action this year at Pakashkan? Looking to head up there the last week of May next year. Would appreciate any reports from this past season.
